text: Vice Admiral Didier Ratsiraka (4 November 1936 - 28 March 2021) was a Malagasy politician. He was the President of Madagascar from 1975 to 1993 and from 1997 to 2002. He was in exile from 2009 to 2011. Ratsiraka died on 28 March 2021 in Antananarivo, Madagascar from cardiac arrest caused by the influenza at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Presidents of Madagascar Category:Deaths from influenza Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Didier Ratsiraka
